summary:
E3 2019: Cyberpunk 2077 is a Grim but Beautiful Picture of the Future 

It’s easy to see why Cyberpunk 2077 has garnered so much...
caption:
E3 2019: Cyberpunk 2077 is a Grim but Beautiful Picture of the Future

It’s easy to see why Cyberpunk 2077 has garnered so much buzz. CD Projekt Red has done a solid job drip-feeding new info and gameplay for two E3s in a row. The gameplay looks intense, and the different builds suggest that no matter how you choose to play the game, you’re going to have fun with any path you take. 

Check it out!

https://www.hardcoregamer.com/2019/06/19/e3-2019-cyberpunk-2077-is-a-grim-but-beautiful-picture-of-the-future/350237/

summary: CYBERPUNK 2077 GRAPHIC TEMPLATES inspired mainly by the promo graphics of the game’s social media profiles. WHAT YOU NEED TO...
caption:
CYBERPUNK 2077 GRAPHIC TEMPLATES

inspired mainly by the promo graphics of the game’s social media profiles.

WHAT YOU NEED TO KNOW:

  • almost everything is customizable, from the character png to the ‘cyberpunk’ text. you can even change the color of those yellow shapes.
  • any photoshop that supports video timeline is required in case you want to create gifs. however, i put a static option in the first one ( the city bg is a gif ) while the third one can easily be static. 
  • fonts: Cyberpunk 2077, Spaceport 2006 & Agency FB.
  •  please, credit me when you use - i put effort & time doing this.
  • if you have any problems working on the file, don’t hesitate to contact me !

CREDITS ( i’m aware of )

- Maul Cosplay & Maja Felicitas for their V cosplay.
- the gif makers of the gifs used in background.
- the graphic designers of these amazing promo interfaces.

leave a  ♡ or reblog if you download ! And remember, you have a city to burn 🔥
DL

summary: So I finally saw that ad in Cyberpunk with the trans woman and the uhhh. The swimsuit or whatever. And I was kind of conflicted...
body:
So I finally saw that ad in Cyberpunk with the trans woman and the uhhh. The swimsuit or whatever. And I was kind of conflicted because like, I get the SENTIMENT and I agree that it COULD be done well, but so far CD Projekt Red doesn’t have the best track record.

BUT. The person they interviewed mentioned that the megacorps or w/e try to sexualize EVERYONE, men, women, and nb people of all kinds of configurations, and you know what? Even if it is transphobic, that means cis people who hate “””political video games””” have to deal with seeing trans bodies in their precious Keanu Reeves shooty action game, so I’m alright with it for now. 

When it comes out I know it’s gonna be handled like dogshit and I’m gonna have to like, be upset I shelled out 60$ for a game that’s explicitly transphobic, but! For now I’m excited at the prospect of angry cis people

summary: Computer game’s character creation not limited by gender The PC game Cyberpunk 2077 will let you make transgender and non-binary...
caption:
Computer game’s character creation not limited by gender

The PC game Cyberpunk 2077 will let you make transgender and non-binary characters.

PC Gamer writes:

The character creator will  give players more options to make a version of the protagonist, “V” that’s more representative of themselves. […]

An example of the options the company wants to offer player is that they can sculpt V’s face with physical traits that could be assigned to to any gender.

“The idea is to mix all of those up, to give them to the players, as they would like to build it,” said quest director Tomaszkiewicz. “Same goes for the voice. We wanted to separate this out, so the players can choose it freely. This is something we are still working on, it’s not as easy as it sounds.”

Read the whole story!
